com.mateolegi.rostrum

Class Rostrum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mateolegi.rostrum.Rostrum

  • public class Rostrum
extends java.lang.Object
    Gives the extended entities the functionalities of the ORM.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Mateo Leal

        T - entity type
        Parameters:
        clazz - entity class
        Returns:
        all records
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the query string is found to be invalid or if the query result is found to not be assignable to the specified type.

      • find

        public static <T> T find(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                         @NotNull(value="Primary key can not be null.")
                         @NotNull(value="Primary key can not be null.") java.lang.Object id)
        Get an entity from persistence context.
        Type Parameters:
        T - entity type
        Parameters:
        clazz - entity class
        id - primary key
        Returns:
        entity or null if not exists
        Throws:
        EntityManagerNotInitializedException - if entity manager can not be initialized.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or the first argument does not denote an entity type or the second argument is not a valid type for that entity's primary key.

      • encryptField

        private static <T> void encryptField(T entity,
                                     @NotNull(value="Field can\'t be null")
                                     @NotNull(value="Field can\'t be null") java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        It encrypts the field in the entity before it is persisted. If the encryption type is one-way proceeds to use the BCrypt method, otherwise AES256 two-way method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - entity type
        Parameters:
        entity - entity
        field - field with Crypt annotation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if field is null.
